00060 std::string TQualityMetric::get_name() const
00061 {

00064 
00065 bool TQualityMetric::evaluate_internal( PatchData& pd,
00066                                         size_t handle,
00067                                         double& value,
00068                                         size_t* indices,
00069                                         size_t& num_indices,
00070                                         MsqError& err )
00071 {
00072   const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handle );
00073   const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handle );
00074   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( e );
00075   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00076   unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00077   const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00078   
00079   bool rval;
00080   if (edim == 3) { // 3x3 or 3x2 targets ?
00081     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00082     if (!mf) {
00083       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00084       return false;
00085     }
00086 
00087     MsqMatrix<3,3> A, W;
00088     mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, indices, mDerivs3D, num_indices, A, err );
00089     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00090     targetCalc->get_3D_target( pd, e, s, W, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00091     const MsqMatrix<3,3> Winv = inverse(W);
00092     const MsqMatrix<3,3> T = A*Winv;
00093     rval = targetMetric->evaluate( T, value, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00094 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00095     print_info<3>( e, s, A, W, A * inverse(W) );
00096 #endif
00097   }
00098   else if (edim == 2) {
00099     MsqMatrix<2,2> W, A;
00100     MsqMatrix<3,2> S_a_transpose_Theta;
00101     rval = evaluate_surface_common( pd, s, e, bits, indices, num_indices,
00102                                  mDerivs2D, W, A, S_a_transpose_Theta, err ); 
00103     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00104       return false;
00105     const MsqMatrix<2,2> Winv = inverse(W);
00106     const MsqMatrix<2,2> T = A * Winv;
00107     rval = targetMetric->evaluate( T, value, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00108 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00109     print_info<2>( e, s, J, Wp, A * inverse(W) );
00110 #endif
00111   }
00112   else {
00113     assert(false);
00114     return false;
00115   }
00116   
00117   return rval;
00118 }

00120 bool TQualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00121                                              size_t handle,
00122                                              double& value,
00123                                              std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00124                                              std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00125                                              MsqError& err )
00126 {
00127   const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handle );
00128   const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handle );
00129   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( e );
00130   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00131   unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00132   size_t num_idx = 0;
00133   const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00134   
00135   bool rval;
00136   if (edim == 3) { // 3x3 or 3x2 targets ?
00137     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00138     if (!mf) {
00139       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00140       return false;
00141     }
00142 
00143     MsqMatrix<3,3> A, W, dmdT;
00144     mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, mIndices, mDerivs3D, num_idx, A, err );
00145     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00146     targetCalc->get_3D_target( pd, e, s, W, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00147     const MsqMatrix<3,3> Winv = inverse(W);
00148     const MsqMatrix<3,3> T = A*Winv;
00149     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_grad( T, value, dmdT, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00150     gradient<3>( num_idx, mDerivs3D, dmdT * transpose(Winv), grad );
00151 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00152     print_info<3>( e, s, A, W, A * inverse(W) );
00153 #endif
00154   }
00155   else if (edim == 2) {
00156     MsqMatrix<2,2> W, A, dmdT;
00157     MsqMatrix<3,2> S_a_transpose_Theta;
00158     rval = evaluate_surface_common( pd, s, e, bits, mIndices, num_idx,
00159                              mDerivs2D, W, A, S_a_transpose_Theta, err ); 
00160     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00161       return false;
00162     const MsqMatrix<2,2> Winv = inverse(W);
00163     const MsqMatrix<2,2> T = A*Winv;
00164     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_grad( T, value, dmdT, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00165     gradient<2>( num_idx, mDerivs2D, S_a_transpose_Theta*dmdT*transpose(Winv), grad );
00166 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00167     print_info<2>( e, s, J, Wp, A * inverse(W) );
00168 #endif
00169   }
00170   else {
00171     assert(false);
00172     return false;
00173   }
00174   
00175     // pass back index list
00176   indices.resize( num_idx );
00177   std::copy( mIndices, mIndices+num_idx, indices.begin() );
00178   
00179     // apply target weight to value
00180   weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, grad.empty() ? 0 : arrptr(grad), 0, 0, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00181   return rval;
00182 }

00184 
00185 bool TQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00186                                             size_t handle,
00187                                             double& value,
00188                                             std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00189                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00190                                             std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00191                                             MsqError& err )
00192 {
00193   const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handle );
00194   const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handle );
00195   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( e );
00196   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00197   unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00198   size_t num_idx = 0;
00199   const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00200   
00201   bool rval;
00202   if (edim == 3) { // 3x3 or 3x2 targets ?
00203     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00204     if (!mf) {
00205       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00206       return false;
00207     }
00208 
00209     MsqMatrix<3,3> A, W, dmdT, d2mdT2[6];
00210     mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, mIndices, mDerivs3D, num_idx, A, err );
00211     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00212     targetCalc->get_3D_target( pd, e, s, W, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00213     const MsqMatrix<3,3> Winv = inverse(W);
00214     const MsqMatrix<3,3> T = A*Winv;
00215     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_hess( T, value, dmdT, d2mdT2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00216     gradient<3>( num_idx, mDerivs3D, dmdT*transpose(Winv), grad );
00217     second_deriv_wrt_product_factor( d2mdT2, Winv );
00218     Hessian.resize( num_idx*(num_idx+1)/2 );
00219     if (num_idx)
00220       hessian<3>( num_idx, mDerivs3D, d2mdT2, arrptr(Hessian) );
00221     
00222 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00223     print_info<3>( e, s, A, W, A * inverse(W) );
00224 #endif
00225   }
00226   else if (edim == 2) {
00227 #ifdef NUMERICAL_2D_HESSIAN
00228     // return finite difference approximation for now
00229 
00230     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle,
00231                                            value, indices, grad, Hessian,
00232                                            err );
00233 #else
00234     MsqMatrix<2,2> W, A, dmdT, d2mdT2[3];
00235     MsqMatrix<3,2> M;
00236     rval = evaluate_surface_common( pd, s, e, bits, mIndices, num_idx,
00237                              mDerivs2D, W, A, M, err ); 
00238     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00239       return false;
00240     const MsqMatrix<2,2> Winv = inverse(W);
00241     const MsqMatrix<2,2> T = A*Winv;
00242     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_hess( T, value, dmdT, d2mdT2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00243     gradient<2>( num_idx, mDerivs2D, M * dmdT * transpose(Winv), grad );
00244       // calculate 2D hessian
00245     second_deriv_wrt_product_factor( d2mdT2, Winv );
00246     const size_t n = num_idx*(num_idx+1)/2;
00247     hess2d.resize(n);
00248     if (n)
00249       hessian<2>( num_idx, mDerivs2D, d2mdT2, arrptr(hess2d) );
00250       // calculate surface hessian as transform of 2D hessian
00251     Hessian.resize(n);
00252     for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00253       Hessian[i] = Matrix3D( (M * hess2d[i] * transpose(M)).data() );
00254 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00255     print_info<2>( e, s, J, Wp, A * inverse(W) );
00256 #endif
00257 #endif
00258   }
00259   else {
00260     assert(0);
00261     return false;
00262   }
00263   
00264     // pass back index list
00265   indices.resize( num_idx );
00266   std::copy( mIndices, mIndices+num_idx, indices.begin() );
00267   
00268     // apply target weight to value
00269   if (!num_idx) 
00270     weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, 0, 0, 0, err );
00271   else
00272     weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, arrptr(grad), 0, arrptr(Hessian), err ); 
00273   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00274   return rval;
00275 }

00277 
00278 bool TQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( 
00279                                            PatchData& pd,
00280                                            size_t handle,
00281                                            double& value,
00282                                            std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00283                                            std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00284                                            std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& diagonal,
00285                                            MsqError& err )
00286 {
00287   const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handle );
00288   const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handle );
00289   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( e );
00290   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00291   unsigned edim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00292   size_t num_idx = 0;
00293   const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00294   
00295   bool rval;
00296   if (edim == 3) { // 3x3 or 3x2 targets ?
00297     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00298     if (!mf) {
00299       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00300       return false;
00301     }
00302 
00303     MsqMatrix<3,3> A, W, dmdT, d2mdT2[6];
00304     mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, mIndices, mDerivs3D, num_idx, A, err );
00305     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00306     targetCalc->get_3D_target( pd, e, s, W, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00307     const MsqMatrix<3,3> Winv = inverse(W);
00308     const MsqMatrix<3,3> T = A*Winv;
00309     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_hess( T, value, dmdT, d2mdT2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00310     gradient<3>( num_idx, mDerivs3D, dmdT * transpose(Winv), grad );
00311     second_deriv_wrt_product_factor( d2mdT2, Winv );
00312     
00313     diagonal.resize( num_idx );
00314     hessian_diagonal<3>(num_idx, mDerivs3D, d2mdT2, arrptr(diagonal) );
00315 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00316     print_info<3>( e, s, A, W, A * inverse(W) );
00317 #endif
00318   }
00319   else if (edim == 2) {
00320 #ifdef NUMERICAL_2D_HESSIAN
00321     // use finite diference approximation for now
00322     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, handle,
00323                                            value, indices, grad, diagonal,
00324                                            err );
00325 #else
00326     MsqMatrix<2,2> W, A, dmdT, d2mdT2[3];
00327     MsqMatrix<3,2> M;
00328     rval = evaluate_surface_common( pd, s, e, bits, mIndices, num_idx,
00329                              mDerivs2D, W, A, M, err ); 
00330     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00331       return false;
00332     const MsqMatrix<2,2> Winv = inverse(W);
00333     const MsqMatrix<2,2> T = A*Winv;
00334     rval = targetMetric->evaluate_with_hess( T, value, dmdT, d2mdT2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00335     gradient<2>( num_idx, mDerivs2D, M * dmdT * transpose(Winv), grad );
00336     second_deriv_wrt_product_factor( d2mdT2, Winv );
00337 
00338     diagonal.resize( num_idx );
00339     for (size_t i = 0; i < num_idx; ++i) {
00340       MsqMatrix<2,2> block2d;
00341       block2d(0,0) = transpose(mDerivs2D[i]) * d2mdT2[0] * mDerivs2D[i];
00342       block2d(0,1) = transpose(mDerivs2D[i]) * d2mdT2[1] * mDerivs2D[i];
00343       block2d(1,0) = block2d(0,1);
00344       block2d(1,1) = transpose(mDerivs2D[i]) * d2mdT2[2] * mDerivs2D[i];
00345       MsqMatrix<3,2> p = M * block2d;
00346       
00347       SymMatrix3D& H = diagonal[i];
00348       H[0] = p.row(0) * transpose(M.row(0));
00349       H[1] = p.row(0) * transpose(M.row(1));
00350       H[2] = p.row(0) * transpose(M.row(2));
00351       H[3] = p.row(1) * transpose(M.row(1));
00352       H[4] = p.row(1) * transpose(M.row(2));
00353       H[5] = p.row(2) * transpose(M.row(2));
00354     }
00355 #ifdef PRINT_INFO
00356     print_info<2>( e, s, J, Wp, A * inverse(W) );
00357 #endif
00358 #endif
00359   }
00360   else {
00361     assert(0);
00362     return false;
00363   }
00364   
00365     // pass back index list
00366   indices.resize( num_idx );
00367   std::copy( mIndices, mIndices+num_idx, indices.begin() );
00368   
00369     // apply target weight to value
00370   if (!num_idx) 
00371     weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, 0, 0, 0, err );
00372   else
00373     weight( pd, s, e, num_idx, value, arrptr(grad), arrptr(diagonal), 0, err ); 
00374   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00375   return rval;
00376 }
